Author: colazerocultleader
Text: you are valid and if you *know* you have ed, it's valid too. who else beside you should be sure you do have it since only you know what's going on.  just because someone restricts at lower number than you doesnt mean that high restriction isn't ed. to my understanding ed isn't number of calories you eat rather than how you behave around food and what going on in your mind.   happ new year :)
